thread.title: Facebook Expands Search to Cover All Public Posts

title: Facebook Expands Search to Cover All Public Posts
text:
Facebook Expands Search to Cover All Public Posts 
NBC News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Searching on Facebook has always been good for tracking down an old friend or a page to follow, but Google was always better suited for keeping up with news or finding a story from a year back. Facebook hopes to remedy that with a...
